title: Looking for a casual bunch of people to play with
body:
I recently just started playing again (almost 1 year since I last played) and would like to find people who just want to have fun playing and not take things too seriously. So no MLGPRO360FAKEYFAKEYNOSCOPES pls :'). My highest rank was Silver 2 but a I am pretty rusty. I don't care much for your level of skill, basic knowledge would do :). I usually play ADC/Supp and can also play top and mid. The jungle seems to have changed so I don't think I'm quite up to that yet.

Leave you role and IGN down below. Thanks!

#[LFT]

replies.body: 2:30 AEST? I'm down. Although my schedule is pretty unpredictable right now. But I'd love to play with you guys
Hey man, I play with a couple of my mates between 2:30 and 4-4:30 and would be cool if you wanted to join us plus we need an adc

Hey, I'm down. Similar sort of thing - been playing on and off for about a year because of uni getting more hectic. Similar sort of level prior to stopping - was in and out of gold promos once or twice in 2013, but I'm a very ranked light player.

UnicornBaconFat; I play anything and have kept semi up-to-date with things bar the top lane smite thing that seems to be happening now.

Okay cool. Yeah I feel you man, uni takes over most things during semesters. I played a couple of games today and man I suck now. They weren't even ranked games. I'll add you and hopefully we can play together in game some time.

I've accepted your thing. 

My uni runs a little differently because med school and such, so my free time is a bit out of whack with other degrees. I'm on the tail end of my week break between rotations but hopefully because I'm heading into GP this coming rotation, it'll be a bit more chilled (surgery sucks for that) and I'l have more free time
I see. I have my exams coming up soon as well so I don't have a specific time I'll be on. hopefully I can gather more people and we could make a ranked team to play with
Hey im not really new i play very often but would still love to join a ranked team or what ever with you im bronze 1
